thread.title: Black Stars' local contingent to leave Accra for Canada tonight
thread.title_full: Black Stars' local contingent to leave Accra for Canada tonight

title: Black Stars' local contingent to leave Accra for Canada tonight
text:
Sports News | 7 October 2015 21:55 CET Black Stars' local contingent to leave Accra for Canada tonight 
The local contingent of the Black Stars will fly out tonight to the US for next week's friendly international against Canada. 
Assistant coach Maxwell Konadu and the backroom staff will be on board. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
